example.parse: (IP (PP-PRP (ADVP (AD 而)) (NP (NN 老师们)) (ADVP (AD 也)) (PP (P 因为) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 拿掉) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (DNP (PP (P 对) (NP (ADJP (JJ 一般)) (NP (NN 青少年)))) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 刻板印象))))))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (NN 学生)) (VP (ADVP (AD 反而)) (VP (VV 得到) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (ADVP (AD 更)) (VP (VA 大)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 表现) (NN 空间))))))
